title: Cannot connect to chat...
body: Hi, ive just had some PC problems and such and have had to reseat my gfx card. tl;dr all working fine now. However when i log into league i am now forever attempting to log onto the chat service. I have already tried deleting the username.preferences and removing all the text from the global.pref files. Please help, just done all that work with my pc to play league and now i can't{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} .

replies.body: There is currently an issue with EUW at the moment where some players can't connect to chat.  This wouldn't be resolved by modifying game files, but some player have reported a workaround by logging out of the League Friends app.  We'll also be providing updates on our[ service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.  Hope that helps!
no fixes are working for me either bro
